detail.name: state
detail.description: The new .checked state of the checkbox ('unchecked', 'checked', or 'partial').

methods.name: bindModel
methods.description: Bind a property on the given model to the input's value.

arguments.name: model
arguments.description: The model object to update with value changes.  If the model has a '.set()' method, .set(property, inputValue) will be used (otherwise the property field of the model will be assigned directly).

arguments.name: property
arguments.description: The property on the model that should be bound to the input's value.

properties.name: checked
properties.description: Whether or not the checkbox is checked.

properties.name: state
properties.description: String representation of the the checkboxes .checked state ('unchecked', 'checked', or 'partial').

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Turns the checkbox into a custom icon, using icons found in mm-icon.

properties.name: iconColor
properties.description: The hex value to color the icon, passed thru to the underlying mm-icon
